title: How to Come Up With a Business Idea, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO6
description: What do you do when you have passion and a strong work ethic, but no idea or direction for a business?  How do you figure out if a product or service is a "million dollar" idea? In this episode, Andy Frisella, along with co-host Vaughn Kohler and special guest Theresa DePasquale, discuss the finer points of generating and testing a business idea.
